        MobileRTCSDKError remoteControlSingleTap(float x,
                                         float y)
        This method is used to simulate a single mouse click, such as tap the screen with one finger to click the mouse.
        Parameters:
        x - the coordinate x that the screen clicks on.
        y - the coordinate y that the screen clicks on.
        Returns:
        result of this gesture. MobileRTCSDKError If the function succeeds, the return value is SDKErr_Success
